nodes.bodyText:
I don't know how granular you'd like to get, but it might be worth calling out that you can search without being authenticated, but the Module Name link will take you straight to a doc preview in that case, not the module details screen. (Some of the other tabs below might be hidden depending on whether you're logged in and what role your user has).
Up to you whether such details should make it into the docs, I just wanted to make sure you were aware of the difference in functionality.
